data.text:
🛑 #Hongkong #HKG (17:15/10AUG GMT+8)

Consequent to thunderstorm activities associated with the Tropical Depression, air traffic control restrictions have been applied which affect operations. Holding of 45-60 minutes to inbound and outbound flights expected. 🙇‍♂️

data.text: How much do you know about @FulcrumBio, the waste-to-fuel company in which we have invested in? Find out how their biofuel, created from household waste, will eventually help cut our #greenhousegas #emissions by 80%. https://t.co/RplFS3ajqp

From its powerful @RollsRoyce engines to its enhanced Economy seats, get to know the @Airbus A350-1000, the latest member of our fleet. #FlyFurther, #FlyCleaner, #Flybetter. #FlyCathayA35K. https://t.co/cYjtdUc0wg

In 1998, #HongKong’s airport moved from #KaiTak to Chek Lap Kok after flight landings got a little too close to residential homes. Find out how the move affected both areas, and the development plans for their future. @hkairport https://t.co/ZGbm4nX730

🛑 #名古屋 #NGO (13:45/7月28日 日本時間）

台風12 号（ジョンダリ）の接近に伴う悪天候が予想されており、7月28，29日名古屋を発着する弊社運航便の遅延が決定しています。助けを求めるメッセージをください (英語、広東語、中国語のみ)。詳しくは 👇 https://t.co/Ez38iKj0mn

data.text: Since the opening of #TaiKwun, the new art and heritage centre in Central’s former police headquarters, we’ve explored some of its highlights. From contemporary art galleries to the cells of Victoria Prison, enter this sprawling hub in #Discovery. https://t.co/G7SEhBbCz6 https://t.co/4AnHfzNO7c

Introducing our new @Airbus A350-1000, featuring a quieter cabin, better oxygen flow to reduce fatigue, and state-of-the-art @RollsRoyce engines running on sustainable biofuel. See for yourself on our new flight to Washington, DC, our longest route yet! #FlyFurther https://t.co/NQYQAtXyqI

data.text: 🛑🛑 #Taipei #TPE Super typhoon #Maria will affect Taipei earlier than previously expected. Some Cathay Pacific and Cathay Dragon flights on 10,11JUL are affected. More info 👉 https://t.co/kRPHjrBBSX. Please DM for assistance. https://t.co/vfPUHckhIb

data.text: 🛑 #沖繩 #OKA #台北 #TPE #福州 #FOC 超級颱風 #瑪莉亞 將影響沖繩及台北當地機場運作。國泰航空及國泰港龍於7月10日來往沖繩和台北之航班有所異動。我們亦密切關注 #瑪莉亞 可能對福州機場的影響。需要協助的乘客，歡迎私信我們。更多資訊 👇 https://t.co/S6A9m66F03

🛑 #Okinawa #OKA #Taipei #TPE #Fuzhou #FOC Super Typhoon #Maria will affect operations on 10JUL at Okinawa and Taipei Airports. Certain flights are affected. We are also closely monitoring its effect on Fuzhou. Please DM for service. More info 👇 https://t.co/orcXcgeJa4
🛑 #沖繩 #OKA 由於超級颱風 #瑪莉亞 逼近沖繩，當地機場運作預計將受影響。國泰港龍於7月10日來往沖繩之航班亦受到影響。需要協助的乘客，歡迎私信我們。更多資訊 👇 https://t.co/S6A9m66F03

🛑 #Okinawa #OKA Cathay Dragon flights operating to and from Okinawa on 10Jul are currently disrupted due to the approach of super typhoon #Maria Please DM for service. More info 👇 https://t.co/kRPHjrBBSX

data.text: 🛑 #峇里 #登巴薩 #DPS 由於 #阿公火山 #MountAgung 噴發之火山灰已覆蓋峇里島機場，當地機場現已關閉。國泰航空今日（6月29日）來往峇里島之航班受到影響。需要協助的乘客，歡迎私信我們。

🛑 #Bali #Denpasar #DPS All flights operating to and from Bali Denpasar today 29JUN are currently disrupted due to the eruption of #MountAgung and the closure of Ngurah Rai International Airport. Please DM for services

Step back in time to our very first airport lounge, “The Discovery Lounge”, with seating for just six passengers in #KaiTakAirport. We have come a long way since then, now with seven award-winning lounges in @hkairport — have you enjoyed them yet? https://t.co/R80vOefl4y
🛑 前往機場方向的北大嶼山公路擁堵。請考慮使用其他交通工具前往機場。機場快綫服務 🚇維持正常。（25-6 08:30)
🛑 Traffic significantly disrupted on the North Lantau Highway towards HK Intl Airport. Please consider taking other means of transport. Airport Express services 🚇 currently not affected.
